reviews.text: Delicious meal with extremely fresh fish! Charming interior and beautiful dishes. Several vegetarian options such as tofu, mushrooms, and vegetable based items. If you eat fish, the salmon is absolutely outstanding, both raw and grilled. We enjoyed dinner here during our visit to Helsinki. Parents were thrilled to eat here and have wanted to try the food since they watched the movie Kamome Diner in 2006. Highly recommend this spot for authentic Japanese food!

Umeshu tasting is highly recommended with grilled eels! We also ordered 5 course menu for fish and meat, with matcha parfait as dessert. Everything tastes like heaven and customer service was very friendly ❤️

I'd just come back from working around Japan a couple weeks ago when I felt nostalgic and went here with my partner (I'd visited once before), and it's easily the closest you're going to get to being in a nice Japanese eatery, both in the quality of the food, as well as the atmosphere.

Absolutely loved the lunch set. Highly recommended!
We took part in a sushi course here. Had lots of fun, the ingredients were great and there was lots to learn, even as someone who's made sushi at home before!

Amazing experience at Ravintola Kamome. We couldn’t fault anything

We had the five courses and the food was delicious and so fresh. We also had the wasabi potatoes (following another review we read) which were amazing and the tempura veg.

The service was excellent too.

Highly recommended and would definitely come back if we were staying here longer.
